attributes.action: dissolve Parliament and call a General Election in light of the corrupt and potentially fraudulent behaviour of a significant minority of Members of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the recent revelations around MPs expenses it is clear that some have engaged in potentially fraudulent behaviour while others have 'milked' the system to their benefit. The constant refrain that what they have done is within the rules shows that they fail to appreciate the public anger at their behaviour. Confidence in the democratic process is being affected and the Prime Minister should call an early election to allow the public to pass judgement on their local MP and deselect those that have behaved dishonourably.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
